nav.div: Cabrillo Unified School District » Our Departments » Personnel Services » Family First Coronovirus Response Act

div.div: 498 Kelly Avenue, Half Moon Bay, CA 94019 | Phone 650 712-7100 | Fax 650 726-0279

li.li: The Cabrillo Unified School District (CUSD) prohibits discrimination, harassment, intimidation, and bullying based on actual or perceived ancestry, age, color, disability, gender, gender identity, gender expression, nationality, race or ethnicity, religion, sex (sexual harassment), sexual orientation, marital, family, parental status, or association with a person or a group with one or more of these actual or perceived characteristics.

link.div: Education is a partnership between student, family, school and community.
